DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the efficacy of Clobex® Spray as compared to Taclonex® Ointment in terms of Overall Disease Severity and Investigator Global Assessment.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy, Safety, Preference and Response Duration of Clobex® Spray and Taclonex® Ointment in Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Moderate to severe psoriasis involving 320% of the body surface area Subjects who have surface area involvement too large that would require more than 50 grams per week of Clobex® Spray or more than 100 grams per week of Taclonex® Ointment Subjects having psoriasis that involves the scalp, face, or groin
